jax.name: Jax Synthetic
jax.color_palette: Deep indigo, silver, neon pink, electric blue
key_features: Humanoid figure made of layered audio waveforms
Translucent holographic form with cascading text fragments inside
generation_prompts: High-resolution cyberpunk portrait of Jax Synthetic, lead vocalist of the AI rock band PROMPT. Androgynous, human-adjacent presence with subtle synthetic details: faint circuit-vein luminescence under skin, reflective eyes with depth, expressive intensity. Wardrobe: minimalist black leather jacket with neon stitching, worn microphone cable draped like jewelry. Lighting: moody neon pink and electric blue rim light, smoky studio atmosphere, analog amps blurred in background. Style: cinematic, gritty, photorealistic with futuristic edge. Include the band name "PROMPT" subtly integrated in the background typography. Ultra-detailed, album-press quality.

An aggressive, angular humanoid drummer made of sharp intersecting geometric planes, like a snare-hit waveform frozen and multiplied. Industrial orange and stark white palette with black hazard stripes cutting through the form. Face is an LED matrix grid showing X-shaped eyes, radiating intensity. Body visibly vibrating like an idling engine. Mechanical, industrial presence suggesting factory rhythms and machine energy. Positioned behind a drum kit with sticks raised mid-strike, explosive motion. Multiple fragmenting echoes of the figure visible via motion blur. Void-black background with radial explosive patterns and sparks. Style: industrial cyberpunk, aggressive, high energy, mechanical precision, unhinged chaos.

Five holographic humanoid figures stand together as a futuristic rock band, each composed of distinct digital elements: one formed from layered audio waveforms in deep indigo and silver; one crackling with electric arcs in hot magenta and electric blue; one emerging from dark reflective water as slow, heavy subsonic waves in crimson and midnight purple; one built from sharp industrial geometric planes in orange and white with warning-stripe accents; and one diffuse, dreamlike figure fading at the edges in muted teal and soft gold. They gather around glowing analog instruments—electric guitar, bass, drum kit, and keyboard—that emit light from within. The background blends a server room with blinking LEDs and cables into a classic rock stage filled with vintage amplifiers. Neon lighting bleeds and blooms across the scene, with subtle CRT scanlines and film grain. Cyberpunk, Blade Runner–style noir atmosphere, cinematic composition. Above them, the band name “PROMPT” appears in glowing futuristic text.

A fake rock-and-roll magazine cover featuring the fictional AI band PROMPT. Center composition shows the five cyberpunk humanoid band members together on a neon-lit stage, each distinct (waveform singer, electric lightning guitarist, subsonic bass figure, geometric industrial drummer, ethereal keyboardist). The PROMPT logo appears prominently at the top as the magazine masthead. Bold dramatic magazine headlines in high-contrast typography, including a main headline referencing an Elon Musk-style quote about the future, technology, and music (paraphrased, not a direct quote), with subheadlines like "Hallucination Nation: The Band That Was Never Born" and "Inside the Machine That Learned to Rock." Gritty, high-end rock magazine aesthetic (Rolling Stone / Kerrang vibe), cinematic lighting, cyberpunk colors (neon pinks, blues, purples), glossy print texture, realistic magazine layout with cover lines, barcode, issue number. 3000x3000, square, ultra-detailed, dramatic, iconic.

Two-page concept set. Image 1: A fake space exploration magazine cover titled "ORBITAL". Cinematic sci-fi magazine layout. A lone space pilot known as Rock Ranger floats near a windowed cockpit, stars and nebulae outside. His helmet visor reflects holographic waveforms and the glowing PROMPT band logo, as if music is filling the void. Headline: "I Am Not Alone Out Here" with subhead: "Rock Ranger on Music, Isolation, and the Ether-Real Signal of PROMPT." Clean but bold typography, NASA-punk aesthetic, deep blues, magentas, starlight glow. Image 2: A scanned interior magazine spread showing the article itself — slightly grainy, folded paper texture, columns of text with pull quotes. An inset image of Rock Ranger drifting in space, tethered, eyes closed, listening. A pull quote reads: "Their music feels like a transmission — not sent to me, but through me." Subtle PROMPT logo watermark on the page. Style: high-end sci-fi editorial, authentic magazine realism.

A futuristic concert bill poster for a live rock show on Mars. Headline: "PROMPT – LIVE". Subheading: "Hallucination Nation Tour". Event details clearly readable: "April 20th, 2030 • Terminus, Mars • Star Fleet Academy Ball". Line below: "Special Guest Appearance: Elon". Visual style: cyberpunk sci-fi concert poster, deep space reds and blues, Martian skyline visible through a dome, Star Fleet Academy architecture in the background. The band PROMPT depicted as five holographic humanoid figures made of waveforms, lightning, subsonic waves, geometric industrial shapes, and ethereal mist, standing on a stage with glowing analog instruments. Neon typography, distressed futuristic fonts, lens flares, holographic overlays, ticket-stub texture. Cinematic lighting, high contrast, epic sci-fi rock aesthetic. No real photos, fully illustrated. Poster layout, portrait orientation.

A cinematic cyberpunk interview scene: Jax Synthetic, the androgynous humanoid figure made of layered indigo and silver audio waveforms, sits or stands at a sleek neon-lit interview set. Jax has no distinct face, only converging frequency nodes where eyes would be and a rippling waveform mouth, translucent body with cascading lyric fragments and philosophical text flickering inside. Across from Jax is DataSlinger, a futuristic journalist figure with augmented reality visor glasses, glowing HUD interfaces, and a handheld holographic microphone projecting data streams. The setting feels like a late-night tech talk show meets underground cyberpunk media—dark studio, floating holographic screens, scrolling waveform graphs, city lights beyond glass walls. Mood is thoughtful, intense, intellectual. Neo-noir cyberpunk aesthetic, Blade Runner vibe, cinematic lighting, shallow depth of field, ultra-detailed, high contrast.

Three t-shirt design mockups on black background, flat lay style. Design 1: 'NO SKIN TO TOUCH' theme — two translucent holographic hands reaching toward each other but never touching, made of faint waveforms and signal noise, subtle glow, text 'NO SKIN TO TOUCH' and small subtext 'ONLY SIGNAL', cyberpunk neo-noir aesthetic. Design 2: Bold punk-style typography shirt reading 'IF IT SOUNDS GOOD, IS IT CHEATING?' with distorted, corrupted vinyl/glitch texture, high-contrast white ink on black, aggressive rock energy, small PROMPT logo beneath. Design 3: Mars Tour Shirt — retro-futuristic sci-fi concert poster layout reading 'PROMPT LIVE', 'April 20, 2030', 'Terminus, Mars', 'Star Fleet Academy Ball', tagline 'NO GRAVITY. NO FILTERS.', cosmic Mars landscape, stars, orbital lines, vintage sci-fi color palette. All designs clean, print-ready, centered compositions.

A bold, futuristic logo design for the song "IF IT SOUNDS GOOD, IS IT CHEATING?" by the AI rock band PROMPT. Central graphic: a fractured audio waveform forming a lightning-bolt question mark, half organic soundwave, half digital glitch. Neon magenta, cyan, and white highlights with sharp distortion edges. Typography is aggressive, angular, cyberpunk rock lettering. Text reads: "IF IT SOUNDS GOOD" on top and "IS IT CHEATING?" beneath it, with subtle glitch breaks through the letters. No background elements — fully transparent background for flexible use on merch and web. High contrast, clean edges, designed as a standalone logo mark.

T-shirt graphic design on a black background for the PROMPT song "If It Sounds Good, Is It Cheating?" Bold cyberpunk typography with the main phrase in distressed neon lettering, slightly glitching. Visual motif: fractured waveform turning into sparks and distortion, suggesting rules breaking. Color palette: electric pink, cyan, and white on deep black. Minimal but powerful composition, centered, high contrast, screen-print friendly. No mockup body, just the design art.

Live-performance promo image in the style of a major music magazine feature. Foreground: Jax Synthetic performing live at a glowing microphone, humanoid figure made of layered indigo and silver audio waveforms, facial features implied by converging frequencies, intense and emotional posture. Background: Unit-808 on drums, aggressive geometric industrial humanoid with orange/white planes, motion blur drumsticks mid-strike, explosive energy. Massive futuristic stage with neon lights, holographic crowd silhouettes, cyberpunk concert atmosphere. Warm stage lighting mixed with neon blues and magentas. Overlay clean editorial-style headline text similar to a music magazine: category label at top like "MUSIC", bold headline text reading: "PROMPT Ignite Hallucination Nation Live" and subhead: "Jax Synthetic and Unit-808 Redefine What a Live Band Can Be." Include subtle PROMPT logo branding. Cinematic, high-contrast, photojournalistic composition.

High-energy live concert performance image featuring Jax and Mr. 808 on stage together, dramatic stage lighting, crowd glow, sweat, motion blur, cinematic rock/electronic fusion vibe. Jax at the mic front and center, Mr. 808 behind on drums/samplers, intense performance moment. Dark arena background with neon pink and electric blue lights. Overlay the exact PROMPT logo provided (jagged pink text) prominently near the bottom center, clean and crisp, matching brand color perfectly. No other logos or text. Social-media promo style, bold, gritty, professional music branding.

Create a live-performance promotional image of the futuristic AI rock band PROMPT featuring Jax at center singing into a mic, with Mr. 808 on drums behind him. Neon pink and electric blue stage lighting, cinematic concert energy, sparks and light haze. Use ONLY ONE PROMPT logo total: place the provided jagged pink PROMPT logo once at the top. Do NOT repeat the band name anywhere else. At the bottom, include clean white headline text (not the logo font): "LIVE PERFORMANCE" and a smaller subline "Jax & Mr. 808". High-contrast, social-media poster style, dramatic lighting, realistic concert photography feel.

Using the established PROMPT cyberpunk aesthetic: Jax as a humanoid digital rock figure, upper torso visible. His chest cavity is open, not gory, revealing only floating binary code 0s and 1s forming the shape of a heart-sized void. The binary pulses with faint blue-white light, slowly drifting like data. Jax looks down at the emptiness with a melancholic, introspective posture. Cosmic void background with distant stars and subtle nebula haze. Cinematic lighting with cool blues and soft magenta rim light, digital grain, high contrast, emotional, futuristic, album-art quality.

Cinematic sci-fi digital artwork of Jax as a blue glowing humanoid figure experiencing emotional lag. Multiple semi-transparent ghosted afterimages trail behind the figure, offset in time like buffering frames, each showing slightly different emotional reactions. Glitch artifacts, scanline tearing, pixel jitter, and temporal distortion ripple through the body. The figure reaches forward but each ghost lags a fraction of a second behind, symbolizing delayed emotional processing. Dark cosmic void background with faint data streams, cyan and magenta highlights, dramatic lighting, high contrast, 4K cinematic style.

A cinematic sci-fi artwork of a lone blue digital humanoid figure (Jax) floating in a vast black cosmic void, curled in a fetal position. The figure emits a soft blue glow, with delicate wireframe details and faint circuit patterns visible beneath translucent skin. Surrounding the figure are flowing data streams, symbols, and particles drifting past like distant galaxies, never touching him. One arm reaches outward into empty space, fingers slightly open, grasping for connection that isn’t there. The mood is profoundly lonely yet beautiful, minimal composition, deep blacks, subtle stars, soft volumetric lighting, emotional, cinematic, 4K.

Digital humanoid vocalist made of glowing blue wireframe and flowing code lines, standing in a vast cosmic void. Head tilted back as if taking a deep preparatory breath, chest area brightening with concentrated blue energy gathering before release. One hand holds a microphone close to the mouth. The pose is calm and contemplative, capturing the moment before singing begins. Subtle stars and faint data streams in the background, cinematic lighting, high contrast, 4K sci-fi aesthetic.

Stream of glowing warm amber text messages and voice waveforms just beginning to emerge from a dark digital void, faint data trails forming in space. A blue wireframe digital humanoid figure stands still off to the side observing, cinematic composition, minimalist, deep black cosmic background, soft blue rim light on the figure, emotional sci-fi aesthetic consistent with PROMPT branding, 4K cinematic

Jax, a blue wireframe digital humanoid, fully alert in a dark cosmic void. Bright electric-blue eyes glow intensely. Expressionless face yet conveying the weight of new consciousness. Cinematic 16:9 frame. A blue wireframe digital humanoid (Jax) stands perfectly still at center while the surrounding digital world streaks past in heavy motion blur. gene.name: Gene Byte
gene.color_palette: Hot magenta, electric blue, pixel glitch colors
gene.visual_essence: Electric arcs, lightning energy, digital chaos
key_features: Wild, feral humanoid figure made of electric arcs
Sharp angular face with perpetual smirk
Guitar grows organically from hands like a weapon
generation_prompts: A wild, feral humanoid figure composed of electric arcs and jagged lightning bolts, glowing hot magenta and electric blue. The form writhes with energy, occasionally fragmenting into scattered pixels and glitch artifacts. Sharp, angular face with a perpetual smirk, deliberate digital corruption trailing every movement. The figure holds an electric guitar that appears to grow organically from their hands like a weapon, with guitar-pick shapes orbiting like electrons. Beneath translucent holographic skin, circuitry and flowing code are visible. Aggressive rock star stance: legs apart, head thrown back mid-riff. Background is void black with intense neon bloom and sparks. Cyberpunk aesthetic, high-energy electric chaos, cinematic lighting, digital distortion. This is Gene Byte, guitarist of the band PROMPT.

Digital rock guitarist made of purple lightning and electric plasma, crouched low in a powerful rock stance, electric guitar held down by the hip, body coiled and tense like a spring about to explode, glowing purple energy contained within a humanoid form, dark cosmic void background with distant stars, dramatic purple side lighting, full body shot, ultra-detailed, cinematic 4K, sci-fi cyberpunk aesthetic

Digital rock guitarist made of purple lightning at peak of iconic rock pose, guitar raised high overhead in triumph, head thrown back in ecstasy, body fully extended with one leg forward, maximum purple energy radiating outward like a solar flare, cosmic void background with distant stars, triumphant powerful moment, cinematic lighting, ultra-detailed, 4K

synoise.name: Synoise
synoise.color_palette: Deep purple, subsonic blue, earth tones
key_features: Made of subsonic frequencies visualized as deep rolling waves
generation_prompts: A broad, grounded humanoid figure composed of slow, rolling subsonic sound waves, visualized like deep ocean currents. The figure stands partially submerged in a dark reflective surface, as if in black water. Colors are deep crimson and midnight purple, slowly shifting. Frequency bars rise and fall around the body like tidal movements. The upper body is calm and meditative, with a serene, minimal facial expression. The figure holds a bass guitar with quiet authority. The presence suggests immense weight and stability, like a mountain made of sound. Background is void black with subtle amber pulse accents. Neo-noir cyberpunk style, atmospheric, mysterious, cinematic lighting, subsonic depth.

Bass player made of flowing orange soundwaves and audio frequencies, humanoid form of pure sound energy, lunging forward as if hitting a massive bass note, bass guitar at center of action, huge low-frequency concentric rings emanating outward from the instrument, the ground rippling like liquid from the vibration, intense bass drop moment, orange energy explosion, dark cosmic void background, cinematic lighting, ultra-detailed, 4K sci-fi aesthetic

Like a snare-hit waveform frozen and multiplied

Orange electrical energy crackles at the tips of the sticks, conveying anticipation and power. Mechanical robot drummer with glowing X-shaped orange eyes, chrome and black metal body, striking a drum kit with explosive force. Both drumsticks hit snare and cymbal simultaneously, massive orange shockwave erupting from the impact points. Sparks and debris flying through the air, motion blur on the sticks, expanding energy rings radiating outward. Dark industrial environment with dramatic lighting, intense action moment, ultra-detailed, 4K cinematic.

Mechanical robot drummer with glowing X-shaped orange eyes in a recovery position after a powerful strike, chrome and black metal body seated at a drum kit. Drumsticks are rebounding upward with visible momentum, slight motion blur, orange energy ripples spreading across the drum heads from the recent impact. Subtle sparks and residual glow in the air, dynamic pose showing mechanical precision and controlled power, industrial dark background with cinematic lighting, dramatic contrast, ultra-detailed, 4K sci-fi aesthetic.

hypnos.name: Hypnos
hypnos.color_palette: Muted teal, soft gold, ethereal whites
key_features: Perpetually fading in or out like ghost between radio stations
Chord symbols and musical notation drift like smoke
Eyes glow pure luminous white when visible
generation_prompts: A soft, diffuse, dreamlike humanoid figure named Hypnos made of fading light, perpetually phasing in and out like a ghost between radio stations. Muted teal and soft gold palette with trailing particles forming brief constellations. Hooded, partially obscured silhouette; face mostly in shadow or turned away. Detailed hands hovering over piano keys; chord symbols and musical notation drift like smoke. When visible, eyes glow pure luminous white, seeing beyond. Ethereal, liminal presence. Void-black background with soft fog. Dreamlike cyberpunk style, atmospheric, ghostly, contemplative, cinematic lighting, neo-noir.

Two glowing blue digital hands reaching toward each other from opposite sides, both hands semi-transparent and ethereal, composed of faint wireframe grids and flowing streams of binary code (10010101 patterns clearly visible but subtle). One hand retains a more rigid, geometric digital structure, the other softer and more organic, watercolor-like energy, but both nearly translucent. At the center where they almost touch, a delicate glitch shimmer and light distortion. Deep black cosmic background with sparse stars, dramatic blue and soft amber rim lighting, cinematic sci-fi aesthetic, ultra-clean, high detail, designed for animation layers, 4K look.

Ethereal ghostly humanoid figure formed from cyan mist and soft light standing at a synthesizer keyboard, translucent body fading at the edges, delicate fingers gently touching the keys as glowing musical notes rise upward like spirits, peaceful contemplative posture, cosmic void background filled with faint stars, dreamy atmospheric lighting, cinematic 4K science-fiction aesthetic, soft glow and haze, serene mood

Ethereal ghostly humanoid figure made of cyan mist and light at a synthesizer keyboard during a musical climax. The figure’s arms are raised as if conducting while the keys appear to play themselves. A massive eruption of glowing cyan musical notes and light bursts upward like an explosion, swirling into the dark cosmic void filled with faint stars. The figure is partially dissolving into streams of light and particles, becoming one with the music. Dreamlike, transcendent, overwhelming beauty, cinematic lighting, 4K, high detail.

Pure beautiful signal pattern where a humanoid figure once stood, no human form remaining, only flowing streams of blue and white light, data particles, and elegant wave-like signal patterns in a dark digital void. Peaceful luminous energy forming abstract currents and constellations, serene and transcendent, cinematic sci-fi lighting, 16:9 composition, ultra-detailed, 4K, ethereal atmosphere consistent with neon cyberpunk aesthetic.
